physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.AUDIT_START_TIMESTAMP

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 =  TO_DATETIME('31/12/4712 00:00', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi') THEN  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ELSE %2 END
expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.AUDIT_END_DATE
physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.AUDIT_END_TIMESTAMP
physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.SERVICE_REQUEST_ID

logicalColumns.name: Internal - # of Raw SR Lifecycle Changes

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.LIFECYCLE_SERVICE_REQUEST_ID

logicalColumns.name: Internal - Total Duration of SR Lifecycle Change (Days)

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: 1.0d *  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_MINUTE , %1,  CASE  WHEN %2 =  TO_DATETIME('31/12/4712 00:00', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi') THEN  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ELSE %2 END ) / 1440.0d
expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.AUDIT_START_TIMESTAMP
physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.AUDIT_END_TIMESTAMP

logicalColumns.name: Internal - Total Duration of SR Lifecycle Change (Hours)

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: 1.0d *  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_MINUTE , %1,  CASE  WHEN %2 =  TO_DATETIME('31/12/4712 00:00', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi') THEN  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ELSE %2 END ) / 60.0d
expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.AUDIT_START_TIMESTAMP
physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.AUDIT_END_TIMESTAMP

logicalColumns.name: Internal - Total Duration of SR Lifecycle Change (Minutes)

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: 1.0d *  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_MINUTE , %1,  CASE  WHEN %2 =  TO_DATETIME('31/12/4712 00:00', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi') THEN  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ELSE %2 END )
expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXSR_LIFECYCLE_F.AUDIT_START_TIMESTAMP
